name: Avion
headline: Avion builds and operates autonomous eVTOL drones that deliver vitalâ¦
description:
Avion is a drone-based digital health platform, designed to bridge the gap between remote clinics and urban healthcare infrastructures. By connecting these isolated clinics with sophisticated labs and well-stocked pharmacies in cities, Avion brings a new era of remote diagnostics and prescription fulfilment.

Avion ensures the rapid, safe, and efficient delivery of vital medical supplies and clinical samples, even to the most hard-to-reach locations. 

Avion's operation uniquely combines cutting-edge autonomous drone technology with digital health platforms. Our drones, built with advanced eVTOL capabilities, ensure seamless take-off and landing capabilities, even in challenging terrains.

Avion's digital health platform serves as the connective tissue between urban health centers and remote clinics. The platform features an intuitive interface, making it easy for healthcare providers to order necessary supplies, track shipments, and even communicate with laboratory and pharmacy staff.

# Bringing HealthCare Closer, Faster
![](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/84770f_3ebbf7ac3e26427b83ca50c82aabaaf8~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_1080,h_600,al_c,q_90,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/84770f_3ebbf7ac3e26427b83ca50c82aabaaf8~mv2.png)
## VISION
At Avion, our vision is to transform the healthcare industry by making access to healthcare universal and efficient, regardless of geographic location. 
![FSi_pz0aQAEXVhp.jpg](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/7f9154_4fa92f341f594581aa273b626e8c39c6~mv2.jpg/v1/fill/w_540,h_840,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,enc_avif,quality_auto/7f9154_4fa92f341f594581aa273b626e8c39c6~mv2.jpg)
## SERVICES
We connect remote clinics with labs and pharmacies in cities!
![](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/7f9154_514f1d65222140ab8e84cb62a03c17f0~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_172,h_172,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_3,enc_avif,quality_auto/7f9154_514f1d65222140ab8e84cb62a03c17f0~mv2.png)
### Digital Health
Our Innovative platform is designed to provide remote clinics with access to labs and pharmacies. With our platform, clinics can easily connect with healthcare resources regardless of their location, providing vital support to patients in need. 
### Our Drones
We provide medical drone delivery service using our tailor designed state of the art eVTOL drones.
​
Our drone technology enables us to reach even the most challenging locations, providing life-saving support to communities that may have previously been underserved.
### Autonomous
At Avion, our autonomous drone flights are a crucial part of our healthcare delivery system, enabling us to transport medical supplies to remote locations quickly and efficiently. Our drones are equipped with cutting-edge technology that allows them to navigate complex terrain, avoid obstacles, and adjust to changing weather conditions, ensuring safe and reliable delivery of critical medical supplies. 
![Screenshot 2023-04-01 213654.png](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/7f9154_bbd27a2f92d14a8cac7040099326fca5~mv2.png/v1/fill/w_123,h_98,al_c,q_85,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_2,enc_avif,quality_auto/7f9154_bbd27a2f92d14a8cac7040099326fca5~mv2.png)
![FSi_pz4agAEptYT.jpg](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/7f9154_6903b6c4a8d64937ac58ee629843adf4~mv2.jpg/v1/fill/w_147,h_86,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_2,enc_avif,quality_auto/7f9154_6903b6c4a8d64937ac58ee629843adf4~mv2.jpg)
## WHY Avion
A different approach
Avion's unique approach to healthcare delivery is rooted in innovation and technology, using cutting-edge solutions to connect remote clinics with the resources they need to provide the best care possible. 
![](https://static.wixstatic.com/media/7f9154_bfd27387e28c46c4bf327bd720abd7b7~mv2.jpg/v1/fill/w_123,h_49,al_c,q_80,usm_0.66_1.00_0.01,blur_2,enc_avif,quality_auto/7f9154_bfd27387e28c46c4bf327bd720abd7b7~mv2.jpg)
## Avion In Numbers

generated_description:
**Company Summary: Avion**

Founded in 2018 and hailing from the innovative environment of Y Combinator’s W20 batch, Avion is not your typical drone company. They’ve taken an ambitious approach to healthcare logistics by merging autonomous eVTOL (electric Vertical Take-Off and Landing) technology with digital health services. 

**Mission:**
Avion’s mission is clear: to create a seamless healthcare delivery system that connects remote clinics to urban pharmacies and labs. This intend to bridge the gap in health services, ensuring that vital medical supplies and clinical samples can be sent quickly and safely to areas that might otherwise struggle to receive them.

**What They Do:**
Avion operates state-of-the-art drones designed specifically for medical deliveries, tackling the challenges of geography with advanced technology. These drones can take off and land in tough terrains, ensuring that no clinic is too remote to access the resources they need.

Their digital health platform acts as the connective tissue, making it simple for healthcare providers to order supplies, track shipments, and communicate effectively with pharmacy and lab personnel. 

**Key Features:**
1. **Rapid Deliveries:** Avion’s drones allow for fast deliveries over challenging terrains, addressing the pressing needs of underserved communities.
2. **User-Friendly Digital Platform:** This intuitive interface helps clinics bridge their needs with urban health resources effectively.
3. **Autonomous Technology:** Their autonomous drones navigate obstacles and adapt to changing weather, ensuring reliable deliveries every time.

**Vision:**
At its core, Avion aims to democratize healthcare access—making it universal regardless of location. They envision a world where healthcare resources flow as freely as information in our digital age.

**Current Operations:**
- Over 5,000 deliveries completed.
- Service spanning more than 200 miles.
- Connecting over 200 clinics, which signifies meaningful outreach in community health support.

Despite being a relatively young company located in San Francisco with a small team, Avion is carving out a significant impact in the healthcare logistic space. It stands as a testament to how modern technology can solve persistent problems in our healthcare system. 

To learn more, visit them at [Avion's Website](http://www.avion.health).
